relation: Priest of Priests of the Sacred Heart of Jesus of Bétharram
textBeforeTable: Events Bishop Emeritus of Dali [Tali] Deceased --> Bishop Lucien Bernard Lacoste, S.C.I. di Beth.
textAfterTable: Note(s): ² Month Uncertain MicroData Summary for Lucien Bernard Lacoste: Bishop Lucien Bernard Lacoste S.C.I. di Béth. (born 25 Feb 1905, died 14 Aug 1989) Bishop Emeritus of Dali [Tali] Second Vatican Council: Session One: Council Father Second Vatican Council: Session Three: Council Father Second Vatican Council: Session Four: Council Father a priest for 59.0 years a bishop for 40.2 years Principal Consecrator: Archbishop Alexandre-Joseph-Charles Derouineau, M.E.P. † Archbishop of Kunming [Kunming] Episcopal Lineage / Apostolic Succession: Archbishop Alexandre-Joseph-Charles Derouineau, M.E.P. † (1944) Archbishop of Kunming [Kunming] Bishop Jean Larrart, M.E.P. † (1933) Titular Bishop of Aulon Bishop François-Lazare Seguin, M.E.P. † (1907) Titular Bishop of Pinara Bishop François-Mathurin Guichard, M.E.P. † (1885) Titular Bishop of Torone Bishop François-Eugène Lions, M.E.P. † (1872) Titular Bishop of Basilinopolis Bishop Eugène-Jean-Claude-Joseph Desflèches, M.E.P. † (1844) Titular Bishop of Sinitis Bishop Jacques-Léonard Pérocheau, M.E.P. † (1818) Titular Bishop of Maxula Prates Archbishop François de Bovet † Archbishop of Toulouse Principal Co-Consecrator
